page.title: 13THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content:
My name is{Rachel Jones}and I am 10. I live in Wollaton, on{Wollaton Hall {Drive.}My house is quite big. it has 5 bedrooms, 3 downstairs rooms and a Utility room. I go to{Middleton {Primary School}which is a very good school. I go{horse-riding}on Saturday. I go to{tennis classes}on Sunday (I have my own racket). We came to Wollaton because my dad got a job as a {doctor.}I have a brother of 8 years old and a sister of 5 years old.
On Saturday I usually wake up at 6.50 a.m. and I usually read but it takes me 10 minutes to make myself get out of bed and get a book. At about 7.30 I get up, get dressed and play with my 'LEGO' or my 'ASTRO BLASTER' game. At 8.30 I go out and let out our rabbit. Then me and my brother play tennis. {More on next page>>>>>>>}
